first_reasoning: The industrial division’s steady sales growth and established platform roadmap make it the best use of our marginal R&D dollar. By focusing on incremental improvements to late-stage products, front-loading long-lead components, and adding contract support for qualification, we can realistically capture earnings upside within 12–18 months—an outcome far more certain than trying to revive the flat-lining consumer unit with a single injection of funds.
second_reasoning: Splitting twenty million into nine million for consumer and eleven million for industrial balances our objectives. The nine million gives consumer enough to complete their two late-stage platform launches and begin eroding losses in year two. Meanwhile, the eleven million lets industrial accelerate high-payoff process tweaks and feature add-ons that convert nearly dollar-for-dollar into earnings within 12–18 months, delivering the fastest, most certain boost to profitability.
